title: Kyoukaizutome no Shinkan desu ga, Yuusha no Zansatsu Shitai Tensou saretekuru no Kanben shite Hoshii desu
original_name: 教会務めの神官ですが、勇者の惨殺死体転送されてくるの勘弁して欲しいです
sinopse:
A priest who spends his days reviving heroes who are transferred to him. But some of them put the revival fee on their tab, or try to skip paying altogether... A melancholic comedy that puts a laid-back spin on the suffering of a "black" workplace!

(Source: Square Enix, translated)
